column4: Im getting ready to move from gentoo to ubuntu, I have a question about some of my spare disks. When I do the install to hda will I be able to keep the data on hdb and hde and hdf intact w/o problems, or would it be better to unplug those drives for the install then plug them in after?
plug them in after ... just in case
you will need to manually add them to /etc/fstab when you plug them in, but thats not a prob
